attributes.action: LOOK INTO THE "S.I.A.", The Security Industry Authority,
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
why can't are local counciles sort out are licence's this would get the waiting time down consideribly.
as many of us work in the S.I.A. badged industry, & need are badge's to work..
The S.I.A. have said that it will take 9weeks to get ar badge's, but a good 45% of us have still not got them over 11/12weeks..

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
